description.value: The code indicating the source of the referral for the admission or visit. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_src_ip_admsn_cd

display.value: ANOMALY: invalid value, if present, translate to '9'

definition.value: ANOMALY: invalid value, if present, translate to '9'

display.value: Non-Health Care Facility Point of Origin (Physician Referral) – The patient was admitted to this facility upon an order of a physician.

definition.value: Non-Health Care Facility Point of Origin (Physician Referral) – The patient was admitted to this facility upon an order of a physician.

display.value: Clinic referral – The patient was admitted upon the recommendation of this facility's clinic physician.

definition.value: Clinic referral – The patient was admitted upon the recommendation of this facility's clinic physician.

display.value: HMO referral - Reserved for national Prior to 3/08, HMO referral – The patient was admitted upon the recommendation of an health maintenance organization (HMO) physician.

definition.value: HMO referral - Reserved for national Prior to 3/08, HMO referral – The patient was admitted upon the recommendation of an health maintenance organization (HMO) physician.

display.value: Transfer from hospital (Different Facility) – The patient was admitted to this facility as a hospital transfer from an acute care facility where he or she was an inpatient.

definition.value: Transfer from hospital (Different Facility) – The patient was admitted to this facility as a hospital transfer from an acute care facility where he or she was an inpatient.

display.value: Transfer from a skilled nursing facility (SNF) or Intermediate Care Facility (ICF) – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from a SNF or ICF where he or she was a resident.

definition.value: Transfer from a skilled nursing facility (SNF) or Intermediate Care Facility (ICF) – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from a SNF or ICF where he or she was a resident.

display.value: Transfer from another health care facility – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from another type of health care facility not defined elsewhere in this code list where he or she was an inpatient.

definition.value: Transfer from another health care facility – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from another type of health care facility not defined elsewhere in this code list where he or she was an inpatient.

display.value: Emergency room – The patient was admitted to this facility after receiving services in this facility's emergency room department (CMS discontinued this code 07/2010, although a small number of claims with this code appear after that time).

definition.value: Emergency room – The patient was admitted to this facility after receiving services in this facility's emergency room department (CMS discontinued this code 07/2010, although a small number of claims with this code appear after that time).

display.value: Court/law enforcement – The patient was admitted upon the direction of a court of law or upon the request of a law enforcement agency's representative.

definition.value: Court/law enforcement – The patient was admitted upon the direction of a court of law or upon the request of a law enforcement agency's representative.

display.value: Information not available – The means by which the patient was admitted is not known.

definition.value: Information not available – The means by which the patient was admitted is not known.

display.value: Reserved for National Assignment. (eff. 3/08) Prior to 3/08 defined as: Transfer from a Critical Access Hospital - patient was admitted/referred to this facility as a transfer from a Critical Access Hospital.

definition.value: Reserved for National Assignment. (eff. 3/08) Prior to 3/08 defined as: Transfer from a Critical Access Hospital - patient was admitted/referred to this facility as a transfer from a Critical Access Hospital.

display.value: Transfer from Another Home Health Agency – The patient was admitted to this home health agency as a transfer from another home health agency. (Discontinued July 1, 2010- See Condition Code 47)

definition.value: Transfer from Another Home Health Agency – The patient was admitted to this home health agency as a transfer from another home health agency. (Discontinued July 1, 2010- See Condition Code 47)

display.value: Readmission to Same Home Health Agency – The patient was readmitted to this home health agency within the same home health episode period. (Discontinued July 1, 2010)

definition.value: Readmission to Same Home Health Agency – The patient was readmitted to this home health agency within the same home health episode period. (Discontinued July 1, 2010)

display.value: Transfer from hospital inpatient in the same facility resulting in a separate claim to the payer – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from hospital inpatient within this facility resulting in a separate claim to the payer.

definition.value: Transfer from hospital inpatient in the same facility resulting in a separate claim to the payer – The patient was admitted to this facility as a transfer from hospital inpatient within this facility resulting in a separate claim to the payer.

display.value: Transfer from Ambulatory Surgical Center

definition.value: Transfer from Ambulatory Surgical Center

display.value: Transfer from hospice and is under a hospice plan of care or enrolled in hospice program For Newborn Type of Admission

definition.value: Transfer from hospice and is under a hospice plan of care or enrolled in hospice program For Newborn Type of Admission

display.value: Normal delivery – A baby delivered without complications.

definition.value: Normal delivery – A baby delivered without complications.

display.value: Premature delivery – A baby delivered with time and/or weight factors qualifying it for premature status.

definition.value: Premature delivery – A baby delivered with time and/or weight factors qualifying it for premature status.

display.value: Sick baby – A baby delivered with medical complications, other than those relating to premature status.

definition.value: Sick baby – A baby delivered with medical complications, other than those relating to premature status.

display.value: Extramural birth – A baby delivered in a nonsterile environment.

definition.value: Extramural birth – A baby delivered in a nonsterile environment.

display.value: Reserved for national assignment.

definition.value: Reserved for national assignment.

display.value: Reserved for national assignment.

definition.value: Reserved for national assignment.

display.value: Reserved for national assignment.

definition.value: Reserved for national assignment.

display.value: Reserved for national assignment.

definition.value: Reserved for national assignment.

display.value: Information not available.

definition.value: Information not available.
